
## Part 1.


        ## The original message that will be encrypted (Plaintext): 

            Hello, I am Abdullah alshehri. And I study in cybersecurity and cryptography.
            My teacher is professor Omar; he is one of the best teachers I’ve ever met.
                And with this simple-built program of Mawhiba, I think I will be ok and get a good mark with a certificate.


        ## The encrypted message (Ciphertext):
            


        ## The key :
            5. Yes it is 5. Only 5, I guess. 


        ## Different programs that encrypted the message :

                https://www.devglan.com/online-tools/text-encryption-decryption

                        
     
                https://ghostvolt.com/text-encryption-decryption.html
        
                        

---------------------------------------------------------------------


## Part 2.

    ## Encryption Process:
        
        Message : Abdullah
        Value : 5

            A -> F
            B -> G
            D -> I
            U -> Z
            L -> Q
            L -> Q
            A -> F
            H -> M

        Shifted message : Fgizqqfm

---------------------------------------------------------------------

## Part 3, Vigenère Cipher:

    ##Encryption Process: 
        Original message : Abdullah.
        Key : "Key"

        A -(K)> K
        B -(E)> F
        D -(Y)> B
        U -(K)> E
        L -(E)> P
        L -(Y)> J
        A -(K)> K
        H -(E)> M

        Encrypted message : KFBEPJKM

---------------------------------------------------------------------
